physical_appearance:This is a brown cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket
 also brown in colour. The cheongsam is sleeveless. There are diaper patterns all over the jacket and the cheongsam. A collar is present on the cheongsam and on the jacket. There are three buttons running down the centre of the jacket\u0027s front. They are circular in shape. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is no label tag on the jacket.
subject_terms_1:dresses (garments) womenswear allover patterns diaper patterns

subject_terms_3:Ethnic costume Chinese costume
sgcool_label_text:This is a sleeveless brown cheongsam in knitted fabric with a matching jacket. The cheongsam could have been wore on overseas trips to China
 during a time when the weather was cool. There is no label on the cheongsam.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a brown cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket, also brown in colour. The cheongsam is sleeveless. There are diaper patterns all over the jacket and the cheongsam. A collar is present on the cheongsam and on the jacket. There are three buttons running down the centre of the jacket's front. They are circular in shape. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is no label tag on the jacket.
